original_text: Judah has been faithless, and abomination has been committed in Israel and in Jerusalem. For Judah has profaned the sanctuary of the Lord, which he loves, and has married the daughter of a foreign god.
korean_text: 유다는 거짓을 행하였고 이스라엘과 예루살렘 중에서는 가증한 일을 행하였으며 유다는 여호와께서 사랑하시는 그 성결을 욕되게 하여 이방 신의 딸과 결혼하였으니

sentences.original_text: and abomination has been committed in Israel
For Judah has profaned the sanctuary of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 유다가 주의 성소를 더럽혔기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and has married the daughter of a foreign god
